name: Dynamite Man - the TNT master bomber
name_original: Dynamite Man - the TNT master bomber
description:
Did not you always want to blow things up? Be a real demolition master? 

Then you have your chance now!

Show your skills as a demolition master and master even the hardest jobs.

Thereby you get also different dynamite variants available and

have the opportunity to set the "timer" of the bombs around even the most difficult

Passages to be mastered partly by chain reaction!

Learn from mistakes, improve your abilities, increase your perception and

become the best blasting master in the world!

CHARACTERISTICS

* Blow things up

* Different ways to win

* Simple, clever and tricky jobs

* Dynamic play by timer setting the bomb

* Bonus bomb "C4" and "Imploder" to complete even the hardest levels
